snippet: Telcel, a unit of América Móvil, settled a dispute with Mexico’s antitrust commission, which agreed to drop a $925 million fine.
abstract: Telcel, a unit of wireless carrier America Movil, settles a dispute with Mexico’s antitrust commission, which agrees to drop a $925 million fine; company will change its pricing practices.
lead_paragraph: Telcel, a unit of América Móvil, settled a dispute with Mexico’s antitrust commission, which agreed to drop a $925 million fine.

headline.seo: Mexico Antitrust Agency Drops Telcel’s $925 Million Fine
headline.main: Mexico Drops Big Fine in Settlement With Wireless Carrier
headline.print_headline: Mexico Drops Big Fine in Settlement With Wireless Carrier
